snippet: BEGUN--Martin. The Board of Trustees of the Sackler School of Medicine NY State American Program of Tel Aviv University mourn the loss of our friend, fellow Trustee, and Founding Member since 1976. We send our very sincerest condolences to Louise and the family. We have worked with Martin for half a century and will miss his guidance and sense of humor and special personality more than can be stated. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BEGUN--Martin. The Board of Trustees of the Sackler School of Medicine NY State American Program of Tel Aviv University mourn the loss of our friend, fellow Trustee, and Founding Member since 1976. We send our very sincerest condolences to Louise and the family. We have worked with Martin for half a century and will miss his guidance and sense of humor and special personality more than can be stated. 1/3
